awscc_mediapackagev2_channel (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::MediaPackageV2::Channel

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • arn (String)

    The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the resource.

  • channel_group_name (String)
  • channel_name (String)
  • created_at (String)

    The date and time the channel was created.

  • description (String)

    Enter any descriptive text that helps you to identify the channel.

  • ingest_endpoint_urls (List of String)
  • ingest_endpoints (Attributes List)

    The list of ingest endpoints.

    (see below for nested schema)
  • input_switch_configuration (Attributes)

    The configuration for input switching based on the media quality confidence score (MQCS) as provided from AWS Elemental MediaLive.

    (see below for nested schema)
  • input_type (String)
  • modified_at (String)

    The date and time the channel was modified.

  • output_header_configuration (Attributes)

    The settings for what common media server data (CMSD) headers AWS Elemental MediaPackage includes in responses to the CDN.

    (see below for nested schema)
  • tags (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for ingest_endpoints

Read-Only:

  • id (String)

    The system-generated unique identifier for the IngestEndpoint.

  • url (String)

    The ingest domain URL where the source stream should be sent.

Nested Schema for input_switch_configuration

Read-Only:

  • mqcs_input_switching (Boolean)

    When true, AWS Elemental MediaPackage performs input switching based on the MQCS. Default is true. This setting is valid only when InputType is CMAF.

Nested Schema for output_header_configuration

Read-Only:

  • publish_mqcs (Boolean)

    When true, AWS Elemental MediaPackage includes the MQCS in responses to the CDN. This setting is valid only when InputType is CMAF.

Nested Schema for tags

Read-Only:

  • key (String)
  • value (String)
